intro: Siphoneranthemum crenulatum, commonly known as the zigzag plant, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its distinctive zigzagging stems. The plant produces small, tubular flowers that are typically purple or blue in color. It thrives in well-drained soil and prefers full sun to partial shade. Siphoneranthemum crenulatum is often cultivated for its ornamental value and adaptability to various garden conditions.
